title: Storms in Midwest and South could unleash deadly floods, strong tornadoes in coming days
description: Waves of thunderstorms are poised to strike parts of the Midwest and South later this week.
content:
Forecasters are warning of potentially deadly flash flooding and strong tornadoes as more rounds of thunderstorms are poised to strike parts of the Midwest and South.
